answers.answer: Lol. . I m not sure but i use to eat so much sweets... Not anymore my craving completely changed... Now i just eat normal food.. question: Had mad cravin for anything with sugar run to the corner shop an got chocolate. I am worried does it mean I might hav diabetes..i did pass the test bt doc said I am measurin big an also I hav this craving since midwive said stay away from sugary stuff. Soo weak to my cravings..
title: Craving sugary stuff
